CustomField.description: Comma-separated list of record type API names that align with the flexipage listed under the "Assigned Flexipage" field. When the "Custom Quick Links" component is placed on a flexipage (which aligns with these record types) for this object, all child "Custom Quick Link" records will be displayed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Comma-separated list of record type API names that align with the flexipage listed under the "Assigned Flexipage" field. When the "Custom Quick Links" component is placed on a flexipage (which aligns with these record types) for this object, all child "Custom Quick Link" records will be displayed.
CustomField.label: Display Record Types
